author: chirino
msg: Changed the KahaStore so that it works with set of data and index managers.

author: crossley
msg: The build.html is now back to its original location.

author: billbarker
msg: Port the fix for MODELER-3 from [modeler] (minus some of the fluff :).
It's mostly non-critical path stuff, so it shouldn't be that much of a performance hit.
Also throw in some Generics cleanups.

author: chirino
msg: - Added some of the intial infrastucture needed to be able to use that DataManager to do index file recovery.
- ObjectMarshaller now avoids doing byte[] allocations.
- We now store the data item's size in the index file so that when we load data from the data file using a
DataItem object, the data payload can be read in 1 io operation, previously an extra io was need to find
out the size of the payload.

author: ammulder
msg: Merge fix for GERONIMO-2061 to trunk
